thread.title_full: Good for the price - Review of Mercure Paris Montmartre Sacre Coeur, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Jay_Saw
title: Good for the price
text:
Pros:
Good location - close to good tube station (Place de Clichy) and Montmartre
Good sized room for the price
Reasonable breakfast selection
Clean room
Good price for location
Clean and relatively modern
Plenty of hot water at peak morning period
Cons:
Bed was hard
Shower in bath with glass screen that results in wet floor
Noisy if you want to open the window (but this is Paris not the countryside)
Bedding was a little over starched
Room design was a but sparse and cold looking (certainly not "cosy")
Breakfast room was short on space
